name: Sarath Peter
aboutMe: I'm an experienced Full Stack Developer and currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Geodesy and Geoinfomatics. I have a strong passion for exploring and developing innovative projects, with hands-on experience in machine learning, mobile and web application development as well as various freelance initiative

From an academic perspective, I have substantial experience in training machine learning models, processing measurement data for modeling purposes, and developing neural networks, especially in the field of image analysis. My current studies continue to deepen my technical foundation and interdisciplinary understanding in geospatial technologies and intelligent systems.
